1.0.name: wordpress/display-latest-rss-feeds
1.0.description:
Display latest feeds from any RSS Feeds accounts. This is very helpful if you want to put to your blog the latest feed blog post of any site.

You can use [loq_feeds] shortcode in your post editor to be able to display the list of feeds in your post. There is also a widget available for this plugin. You can check it in the widget section.
